header.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Specialist
header.description: I transform ideas into innovative digital solutions powered by Artificial Intelligence

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a full stack developer and AI specialist, focused on building high-performance web and mobile applications. My expertise combines modern frontend development, robust backends, and the implementation of Machine Learning models and generative AI solutions. I design intelligent cloud-deployed systems that are scalable and secure. I transform complex ideas into impactful digital products that deliver real results.
